vote.title: Authorize a cooperative agreement for (1) an acquisition contract for the Intellisoft Identity Management System (IDMS), perpetual software license, and installation/implementation for managed security services for the Department of Aviation, for the purpose of replacing the current IDMS, HID SAFE (V4.9), which will no longer be supported after April 1, 2025; and (2) an accompanying one-year maintenance and support contract for Intellisoft IDMS with Convergint Technologies, LLC through Sourcewell - Not to exceed $1,588,719.67 - Financing: Aviation Fund
vote.description: Authorize a cooperative agreement for (1) an acquisition contract for the Intellisoft Identity Management System (IDMS), perpetual software license, and installation/implementation for managed security services for the Department of Aviation, for the purpose of replacing the current IDMS, HID SAFE (V4.9), which will no longer be supported after April 1, 2025; and (2) an accompanying one-year maintenance and support contract for Intellisoft IDMS with Convergint Technologies, LLC through Sourcewell - Not to exceed $1,588,719.67 - Financing: Aviation Fund
